nodes.text: A vault built by the Rakata species was located in the Warlord's Deep in the the Tomb, an ancient prison on the planet Belsavis, and was used by the Galactic Republic to imprison a number of alien criminals. During the invasion of Belsavis, Doctor Fizz Galko exposed several of the prisoners in the vault to his creation Xenovirus Prime, but his team was forced to flee before they could release the prisoners, so Galko recruited other Imperials to free the prisoners and thus allow them to spread Xenovirus Prime to the Republic.
The Republic prisoner vault appears as a location on Belsavis in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, and is the site of the Imperial mission "The Carriers of Xenovirus Prime."
